attributes.description:
Squatchi is a children's home shoe sizer to meaure kids feet at home and track their feet growth.  Each time you measure a child's foot, mark it with a marker and over time you create a foot growth chart keepsake.  

Also, by marking your child's foot length, you have a reference so you can buy shoes on line or go to the shoe store without them.  

Squatchi is a great baby gift that mom can use for up to 12 years of the child's life!
attributes.title: Squatchi, the big foot sizer for little feet
